pr_title: Allow using refs of module definitions within isolated functions

timeline.message: Allow using refs of module definitions within isolated functions

timeline.bodyText:
The test disabled is https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/master/tests/jballerina-unit-test/src/test/resources/test-src/record/record_closure_default.bal#L1.
With the requirement that record field defaults have to be isolated, based on the current implementation I don't think we can test what we originally tested here.
But disabled this without removing it, since we may be able to add back a different version of the test once we support isolated module level variables (#25898).
timeline.author: MaryamZi
